website_summaries.verdict: A stylish choice if you're looking for a lamp shade that fits modern décor.
pros: Contemporary style in a rectangular shape
Soft gray synthetic fabric and styrene hardback design filter light for a natural effect
cons: The color is a bit darker than expected, and the bold shape won't compliment delicate lamp bases

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but gold spider
customer_reviews.text: Shade is nice. Be careful, easily dented. Disappointed to see the spider on this grey shade in shiny gold (there are two answers to this question on the item description polished brass and grey)...gold on this shade is a basic design clash. Would be 5 stars if spider was of some silver finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer L. Meller

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a dark grey lampshade for several weeks. The most reasonable one I could find locally was over $120, although it was really good looking. I needed not only dark grey, but if possible, something with a bit of texture. Enter this lampshade... It looks perfect, and I'm so happy to find it. Quality is fantastic! Is there anything better than finally finishing a room?
customer_reviews.author: KKann

customer_reviews.title: Elegant.
customer_reviews.text: Although there were no reviews for this item, I decided to give it a try. The lamp shade arrived undamaged, which is a problem I have encountered in the past. It looks way better in person than on the computer screen. It seems sturdy and well built and has slightly textured look and feel to it. I would recommend this item for a touch of elegance to a room.
customer_reviews.author: J Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this lamp shade. Good quality. My only complaint is the spikes that attach to your lamp are gold. I was trying to match it with a silver lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purple hue when light is on- love it
customer_reviews.text: This lampshade was better than I expected! It is very true to size and came in two large boxes to ensure no dents. What I didn’t expect was the purple hue when the light is on, I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older shade with this one. It really transformed the lamp, which we originally thought we would need to replace. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Smaller shades perfect for side table smaller lamps. Love the shades. However, when ordering two of the same item, I would expect them to arrive together since the vendor is the same. Seems strange that one of the two is arriving separately.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Finds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well-made shades
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for accent lighting in my bathrooms. Beautiful and well constructed. I thought the clips would fit the bulbs from my Christmas candle sticks but they are a bit larger and more conducive to chandelier bulbs. I loved the shades so much I looked for a larger bulb that would still fit the candle and made them work. Very pleased with the look!
customer_reviews.author: B. Walters

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: The box this was delivered in was unharmed. Whoever packaged the lamp shade bent it and broke it before closing the box thinking I wouldn’t care. Also, this lampshade is pure plastic. Just the lowest quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for my dining room chandelier. so happy with quality and color- not as black -which is good more slivery /grey /black.
customer_reviews.author: Advance Kimballs

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! The shade color was great! It was definitely worth getting. It does not seem to be very sturdy as material feels very thin- but I need it for looks and it will only be touched my cleaning gal.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a lamp shade destroyed by my grandson I love the color well made! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mommasuzie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this shade. Quality and beauty make this one beautiful piece to update your lamp. Love mine
customer_reviews.author: D. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice dark grey
customer_reviews.text: This lamp shade was a nice dark grey, and fit well on my existing lamp. However, I ordered 2 matching for my nightstands, one came crumpled and the other perfectly fine. I guess I’ll try for a replacement and hope the packing is better. The 2 pics, one good, the other with bent marks in the shade from the crumples
customer_reviews.author: kim crestani

customer_reviews.title: Good color, but....
customer_reviews.text: Shade is the right size/color, but has none of the texture the photos exhibit. It's a very smooth surface that you'd find on a less expensive shade. As others have mentioned, the spider is gold tone which doesn't match the shade or the hardware I purchased for these. Debating on keeping.
customer_reviews.author: William Zaccheo

customer_reviews.title: This lamp shade is very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a gray and black lamp shade. This one is the perfect color and size.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made lamp shades!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shade.. the grey and black is the finishing touch! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Mattos

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lamp shade. Was a bit miffed though, it required a signature for delivery. Weird. I just missed UPS at my house and got a message that signature was required. Fortunately the driver was on the next street. Saved both of us an additional trip!
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Crushed and damaged.  Flimsy item.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived crushed and dented. Could not get lines out when it was crushed. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction and materials are good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy construction and the materials used on the lampshade are good quality. I loved the texture of the material and the color was what I expected when looking at the website. Overall I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented and unusable
customer_reviews.text: This lamp shade arrived all bent and tacky on one side. Unfortunately, it was on the front side. Unable to use it in this condition. I’ll be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P. Mascarenas

customer_reviews.title: This lamp shade looks great! It came packaged well
customer_reviews.text: This lamp shade looks great! It came packaged well, and arrived in good condition. It is slightly darker than it appears in the photos, but not by much, and does brighten up when the light is on. Well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two shades , they arrived earlier than predicted. They fit in so well with our decor needs. And are a beautiful addition to our lights. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Won’t fit standard LED bulb and if you try to shape the bulb clip the weak wire breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Bible

customer_reviews.title: Spider frame is gold
customer_reviews.text: Would not have ordered if the pictures or the specs would have indicated that the mounting spider frame was gold. It should be silver to match with similar color tone bases.
customer_reviews.author: RayJ

customer_reviews.title: What a difference this great lamp shade made in my newly redecorated living room.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect lamp shade for my pewter lamp! What a difference a nice, great fitting lampshade makes! This shade was the finishing touch for my redecorated living room,
customer_reviews.author: Debbie- Ojai, CAAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gray lamp shade. I had an intended use for it, but then couldn't decide cuz it fit with so many lamps in my house!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Schryber

customer_reviews.title: Beat up marks cause shadows to appear when lamp is on
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size but was disappointed with the beat up marks it had. Only noticed them after opening because I could not tell through the plastic. Unfortunately the marks show through when the light is on
customer_reviews.author: Lewis D.

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the credit please?
customer_reviews.text: Returned these 2 shades... not as expected. Color darker and quality not what I had hoped. The returns were received by vendor a week ago... where is the credit for the 2 shades please?
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This shade is perfect for my lamp! It really finishes out the room ambiance. Great customer service too. I originally received a damaged product. The return was easy and I had my new product in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The color is a nice deep gray and the texture of the fabric is elegant
customer_reviews.author: D & A Katsanis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase material not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the material and it came damaged. As if someone punched it leaving dents all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Zaharenia

customer_reviews.title: couldn't have asked for anything better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go on a marble lamp base that I inherited from my grandparents after they passed away and this shade complements it so well, couldn't have asked for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: TDH

customer_reviews.title: Sets off a room
customer_reviews.text: While one of my shades came a little dented the shades when the lights are on create a beautiful warmth and coziness to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Greatest
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lamp shade. Exactly what it says it is it is. Simple and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: shiny. very shiny.
customer_reviews.text: they came a bit smooshed and they are very shiney. do not look like picture.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice , worth the wait.
customer_reviews.text: Great style and look. Material high quality .... as good as I had hoped. Worth it , even though I had to wait 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: MATT G

customer_reviews.title: I love the shade
customer_reviews.text: I love the shade. I had to get a different harp for my lamp though to make it work, but it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size but liked them so much will keep and use in another room.
customer_reviews.author: starla kelsey

customer_reviews.title: beautiful - but I ordered two and both came damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful - but I ordered two and both came damaged - I had to return both of them. I will not order again
customer_reviews.author: LynJohn

product_meta.title: Aspen Creative 36003, Transitional Rectangular Hardback Shaped Spider Construction Lamp Shade in Grey & Black, (8" + 16") Wide ((8" + 16") x (8" + 16") x 10")
product_meta.description: Color:Grey & Black| Size:(8" + 16") x (8" + 16") x 10"| Style:RECTANGLE - SPIDER CONSTRUCTION - 1 PACKAspen Creative is dedicated to offering a wide assortment of attractive and well-priced portable lamps, kitchen pendants, vanity wall fixtures, outdoor lighting fixtures, lamp shades, and lamp accessories. We have in-house designers that follow current trends and develop cool new products to meet those trends. Offers a 1 pack transitional rectangular hardback lamp shade in Grey & Black. Made with synthetic fabric . The lamp shade size is (8" + 16") top x (8" + 16") bottom x 10 inch height. This lamp shade is a spider construction – designed to attach to lamp harp. Hardback shades use virgin styrene backing board to produce a warm, natural & smooth light – more appealing than shades made with recycled styrene board that can crack & yellow over time.. applications - for table lamps, accent lamps, vintage lamps, candle stick lamps and kid's room lamps
feature_bullets: 1 pack transitional Rectangular Hardback replacement lamp shade
Spider construction – designed to attach to lamp harp

Aspen Creative hardback shades use Virgin Styrene backing board to produce a warm, natural & smooth light – more appealing than shades made with recycled Styrene board that can crack & yellow over time.
Applications - For table lamps, accent lamps, vintage lams, candle stick lamps and kid's room lamps
Synthetic Fabric in Grey & Black (8" + 16") top x (8" + 16") bottom x 10" height
